intro: Collaboration Project Between Picross™ S and SNK Arcade/NEOGEO Games!
description:
Characters from SNK's arcade and NEOGEO library are coming to the Picross S series for Nintendo Switch™!

50 titles are included—from arcade heroes of the past to iconic NEOGEO characters whose "100 Mega Shock" impact can still be felt in the modern day.
Comes with the usual Picross S series puzzle modes: Picross, Mega Picross, Color Picross, and Clip Picross, as well as an Extra mode that features larger puzzles recreating famous scenes.

This entry also has a new Time Attack mode where players must try to finish puzzles within a time limit. See how good you really are at Picross by aiming for the golden crown in every one of them!
The number of puzzles is as follows: 150 each for Picross and Mega Picross; 5 for Clip Picross for a total of 200 piece puzzles of 40 each; 30 for Color Picross; and 5 for Extra.
Time Attack mode contains 30 carefully chosen Picross puzzles.

Other new features include an Art Gallery, where players can browse key visuals at their leisure, as well as grid guidelines that make it easier to select squares when sharing content via streaming or social media.

Picross is a picture crossword puzzle game where you follow hint numbers to complete a picture.
With simple, easy-to-follow rules, it's a game anyone can play!
